sen.j: 中納言（ちゅうなごん）は、朝廷組織の最高機関、太政官の職の一つで、大納言に次ぐ官位で、四等官の中の次官（すけ）に相当する令外官。
sen.e: "Chunagon" (Middle Counselor) is a post ranking below Dainagon (chief councilor of state) in the Daijokan (Department of State), the highest organ in the Imperial Court, and is a rank outside of the ritsuryo system, corresponding to Suke (assistant director) in the shitokan (four classes of government officials).

"Chunagon" (Middle Counselor) is a post ranking below Dainagon (chief councilor of state) in the Daijokan (Department of State), the highest organ in the Imperial Court, and is a rank outside of the ritsuryo system, corresponding to Suke (assistant director) in the shitokan (four classes of government officials).

"Chunagon" (vice-councilor of state) is a post ranking below Dainagon (chief councilor of state) in the Daijokan (Grand Council of State), the highest organ in the Imperial Court, and is Ryoge no kan (class outside of the Ritsuryo system), corresponding to Suke (assistant director) in the Shitokan (four classifications of bureaucrats' ranks).

sen.j: 水戸藩主の多くは権中納言に任官していたため「水戸黄門」と呼ぶ。
sen.e: Since many heads of the Mito Domain were assigned as Gonchunagon (acting middle counselor), it was referred to as 'Mito Komon.'

sen.j: もっとも有名なのは2代藩主徳川光圀であり、通常「水戸黄門」と言った場合は光圀のことを指す。
sen.e: The most famous is Mitsukuni TOKUGAWA, the second head of the domain, and 'Mito Komon' generally refers to Mitsukuni.

sen.j: 大宝 (日本)元年（701年）3月21日 (旧暦)の大宝律令の施行で廃止されたが、慶雲2年（705年）4月17日 (旧暦)に令外官として復活している。
sen.e: It was abolished on March 21, 701 (old calendar), when Taiho Ritsuryo was enforced, but was restored as a rank outside of the ritsuryo system on April 17, 705 (old calendar).

sen.j: 職掌は大納言の不足を補い、宣旨を奏上し、下問を待ち、太政官の合議に参加する、というもので、大納言とほぼ同様であったが、大納言のように大臣の代行をすることはできない。
sen.e: The main function was to fill in for the Dainagon, present the imperial letter to the emperor, wait for inquiries, and to attend conferences at the Daijokan, much the same as Dainagon, but unlike Dainagon, they could not act on behalf of the minister.

sen.j: 南北朝時代 (日本)以降は大納言と同じく権官ばかりで正員がなくなったことが高田与清（たかだともきよ）『官職今案』に見えている。
sen.e: According to the "Kanshoku konan" ("官職今案") by Tomokiyo TAKADA, during the period of south and north courts (Japan), as with Dainagon, there were only temporary personnel and official personnel were nonexistent.

sen.j: 中納言に任官されるための基本的な条件は参議左大弁・右大弁左近衛中将・右近衛中将検非違使別当のうちいずれかひとつに任官した経歴をもつことである。
